title: ifightformerkel
author: ifightformerkel
content: !Welcome to Bityx.com — the top leading crypto exchange.!Registration code for new users:"START2023"!All official links • Bityx.com   • Bityx.nl   • Bityx.us•Today, we will give you a detailed guide on how to get started on Bityx, let’s get started:Register AccountComplete VerificationDeposit or Buy CryptoExplore Bityx Products and ServicesStep 1: Register Account••• USE REGISTER CODE TO START "START2023"••••Getting started on Bityx is quick and easy. Irrespective of the device you are using, you can create an account on Bityx.com with your email or phone number.Step 2: Complete the Verification•We take security seriously and that’s why we require that every user on Bityx completes identity verification to unlock the fiat deposit and withdrawal limits.•Bityx identity verification process is fast and only takes a few minutes to complete — it includes verifying your account information, providing ID documentation, and uploading a selfie of yourself.•We advise all users to verify their Bityx accounts to keep them secure and increase their security. For more information, please take a look at our security tips here.Step 3: Deposit or Buy Crypto•Once your account is fully verified on Bityx, then it’s time to deposit some crypto in your Bityx wallet. If you already hold crypto in another wallet, you can easily transfer it to your Bityx wallet. For beginners, there are steps to buy crypto on Bityx here.Here are ways to buy crypto on Bityx:Deposit Fiat•Depending on where you are accessing Bityx from, you can deposit up to 50+ fiat currencies to your Bityx account using bank cards or Wire transfers. Once you have deposited any amount, you can use it to buy crypto directly in your wallet.Buy Crypto Using Debit/Credit Card•Debit/Credit cards are one of the fastest methods for buying crypto on the Bityx website.•Also, it is easy to withdraw your crypto from your Bityx wallet whenever you need to. However, keep in mind that you should never share your Bityxaccount or wallet password, 2FA codes, and private keys with anyone, and Bityx will never ask you to disclose any of this sensitive information.Step 4: Explore Bityx Products and Services!Spot Trading!Once you have made a deposit on Bityx, you can explore the trading options on our website. In the market section, you can trade hundreds of crypto, including BTC, BNB, ETH, and many more!!!!About Bityx!!!Bityx is one of the world’s leading crypto exchanges and the most trusted and secure exchange to trade simply with maximum security. Bityx provides an excellent user experience, leading security, 24/7 live support, and fast Deposit & Withdrawal.

comments.author: adoinerv
comments.body: I just discovered Bitx. My thoughts so far are positive.Maybe not the best but may have big potential.

comments.author: Xelivend
comments.body: I have never heard Bityx.If they have a large clients, they should try harder to make their name known. There are a lot of DEX and CEX exchanges out there. They may need a little more marketing.

comments.author: Demenecia
comments.body: I don't know if you've heard of bityx , but I think they can enter the world of exchange firmly. It is a crypto exchange that offers an progressive trading system that enables digital currency buying and selling transactions as a web.

comments.author: Cedronal
comments.body: if bityx wants to be bigger they should works for their popularity. They already have more than 1M+ users and they're targeting to get big slice of cake Good luck with it

comments.author: wenastrius
comments.body: Quote from: Demenecia on December 13, 2022, 12:57:02 PMI don't know if you've heard of bityx , but I think they can enter the world of exchange firmly. It is a crypto exchange that offers an progressive trading system that enables digital currency buying and selling transactions as a web. So far it's just a strong exchange. There are a lot of exchange like Bityx and it is very difficult to offer something new. You just need to work honestly and develop your reputation, then everyone will be happy to use the exchange!

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Your exchange has an unreasonable price for BTC-USDT Pair right now the real price is still below $18,000 but on your exchange it reached $18,900 I think this is like a trap because people will think this is a good time to arbitrage but in the end they can't withdraw their money there at all, so be careful who wants to use this exchange

comments.author: 1udsonar1
comments.body: I have been using bityx for about 4 months. During this time I have made more than 40 deposits and made more than 50 withdrawals. Everything works perfectly

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: SCAM! STAY AWAY FROM THIS EXCHANGE!!1. Someone have been scammed already, see: Beware of BITYX . COM Exchange Total scam lost 5100 $ in USDT & Bitcoin2. They have been sending bots to create fake user reviews, see: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5420996.msg61328547#msg61328547 (also look at all the newbie accounts above this post)3. OP's account has changed hands, check its trust feedback! which means they even bought a legendary account to make themselves appear legitimate, something every scammer do!

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: On top of what Potato Chips said, they have literally no shame, they even copied the so-called proof of funds page from Bitgethttps://www.bitget.com/en-IN/protection-fundhttps://bityx.com/en/protectionWith the same address labeling them as their own funds, not mentioning the whole page design, I mean after they stole the whole identity and text what's a few gifs and buttons?The second scam lately with shills bumping it and with the same fake prices bait, after Kufrux just a week ago, must be lucrative again.

comments.author: Vonathan
comments.body: Why have I been quietly trading on bityx for a year now and have made dozens of transactions. My account has not yet been blocked or even asked to verify my identity. Maybe someone is just breaking the rules...

comments.author: janggernaut
comments.body: Quote from: Vonathan on December 15, 2022, 06:39:50 AMWhy have I been quietly trading on bityx for a year now and have made dozens of transactions. My account has not yet been blocked or even asked to verify my identity. Maybe someone is just breaking the rules...Why you , who just registered today saying something legit about this site? Where is the proof you have been trading for 1 year? . We can't believe with your words, especially someone got scammed by them. Post some proofs to proven your words, or you could be just another puppet accounts from that exchange

comments.author: Wodsay99
comments.body: I like to trade on bityx because here the commissions are even lower than on binance! There are various promotions going on all the time. Now you can get a welcome bonus. You can receive bonuses for reviews of exchanges on different sites.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: ifightformerkel on December 07, 2022, 11:09:41 AMBityx.com — the top leading crypto exchange...If this were really the case, then such an exchange would definitely be in the Coinmarketcap rating - https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges/, but it is not there. Although this rating is full of shitty exchanges, Bityx still falls short of their level. There is no point in using the services of an unknown exchange, while there are many CEX and DEX that have already proven their security.

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: This exchange seems to have set a trap by providing BTC-USDT Pair trading higher than other exchanges where there is a difference of around $1,000 like the screenshot of my previous post so it's clearly a fraudulent exchange, but continue to confidently use new accounts to continue to give reviews that they are trusted so stay away if don't want to lose money.

comments.author: Waynaryles
comments.body: I have been trading bityx for over a year. Sometimes there are pumps or dumps here. But you just need to trade without violating the rules of the exchange and you will not have any problems. I freely make deposits and withdrawals to my wallets.

comments.author: Wilerom
comments.body: I understand why many here do not trust newbie accounts. But i received an offer from the exchange in the mail, to receive a bonus for my review of the exchange. Of course i want to receive a bonus and that's why i registered my account. I like the exchange, although i have only been trading for 4 weeks, but i have already made deposits and withdrawn cryptocurrencies several times.

comments.author: doomloop
comments.body: Quote from: Wilerom on December 16, 2022, 06:03:46 PMI understand why many here do not trust newbie accounts. But i received an offer from the exchange in the mail, to receive a bonus for my review of the exchange. Of course i want to receive a bonus and that's why i registered my account. I like the exchange, although i have only been trading for 4 weeks, but i have already made deposits and withdrawn cryptocurrencies several times.I think that's because a lot of newbies have committed a crime such as scamming and shilling. They are not afraid whatever happens to their accounts because they can always create another one. The exchange had a review campaign and maybe that was the purpose on why you and other newbies are here in the thread to give a positive statement?But, I think a legit review campaign should also compose of negative feedback. Sure there are some negative feedbacks here but that only came from higher rank members and I do not think they are participating on the same promotion. I noticed that the op do also get a negative feedback. This isn't good.
